name: Anirban Sengupta
content: Prof. Anirban Sengupta, IEEE Distinguished Visitor (IEEE Computer Society) and IEEE Distinguished Lecturer (IEEE Consumer Technology Society), FIET, FBCS, FIETE, Professor, Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Indore PROF.
